name: Key Media Award and Event Sites
summary: Award and Event websites created with Wordpress which features information on company events
description:
Key Media is an events and publishing company and it delivers content in multiple platforms like websites and magazines. It is a company that holds annual events which features award winning individuals or companies in their fields like law, insurance, mortgage, etc.

As part of the development team, award and event sites were created using wordpress. These sites features information on the event. Besides working on the features on these websites, I am also involved in managing the contents, optimize images and assisting the events team with their change requests.

name: Key Media Special Reports
summary: Special Reports features the list of award winning individuals and companies and a summary of their works
description:
Key Media is an events and publishing company and it delivers content in multiple platforms like websites and magazines. It is a company that holds annual events which features award winning individuals or companies in their fields like law, insurance, mortgage, etc.

Special Reports features the list of award winning individuals and companies and a summary of their works. I coordinate with content creators to create these web pages and provide assistance on creating web elements or reusable code beyond their capabilities to create in their CMS like promo banner, pullquote sections, tables and any formatting issues.

links.name: HRD US - Best Places to Work 2023
Canadian Mortgage Professional - Best Mortgage Employers 2021

name: Key Media EDM Emails
summary: Email Templates created for Key Media events and client requests
description:
Key Media is an events and publishing company and it delivers content in multiple platforms like websites and magazines. It is a company that holds annual events which features award winning individuals or companies in their fields like law, insurance, mortgage, etc.

The company also sends out EDMs for their events and client requests. I am the point person for coordinating with the marketing team to create EDMs or the html email templates and ensure compatibility across different email clients.

name: My Portfolio Website
summary: A website to showcase my works
description: I created and designed this website to showcase my works on both web development and graphic design. This is developed using React.

name: Dalaroy Beach Resort
summary: A website developed for Dalaroy Beach Resort, located in Ternate, Cavite, Philippines
description: A website for Dalaroy Beach Resort, located in Ternate, Cavite, Philippines. The website is developed using HTML, CSS, SCSS. Javascript, Bootstrap, Jquery, and Google Maps.

name: Peramoko
summary: A lending-as-a-service platform website created under C88 Financial Technologies Pte Ltd.
description:
Peramoko is a lending-as-a-service platform website where customers who applies for a loan will be given a customized loan offer based on their information. It includes an Employer Workspace for partner companies of C88 Financial Technologies where they can enroll their employees to Peramoko, and a Borrower Workspace for sending loan applications. 



 This is an ASP.net project developed using C#, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Jquery. A feature called Geolocation is developed with Google Maps API to capture customer's address information accurately.

name: C88 Manage Print Services Email Template
summary: An email template created for Manage Print Services under C88 Financial Technologies Pte Ltd.
description: An email template created with HTML used for managing print requests of applications in C88 Financial Technologies.

name: Housing and Vehicle Loan Calculator Widget
summary: Calculator widgets developed for comparing rates from different partner banks
description:
A Housing loan calculator and Vehicle loan calculator widget developed for C88 Financial Technologies Pte Ltd. These were created for the company's partner websites and allow users to compare rates from different partner banks.

Both widgets are developed using Javascript and JQuery and features pre-made themes which the partners can choose to complement their website's style.

name: Excel to HTML Table Generator
summary: Made for Mortgage Instroducer Website to generate tables from excel file
description: A simple generator of HTML tables used by content editors in the Mortgage Introducer Website. The Mortgage Rates on this website are updated weekly and provided to editors via excel file. I used javascript so they can easily extract the data in HTML code ready for the editors to include on the pages via the company's CMS.

name: Yummy Vites

description: Provided a logo, packaging, and pillow pouch design with 4 different variants as a freelance graphic designer. Yummy Vites is a product of Wert Philippines.

name: Detailing Aid

description: Provided graphic design services to produce detailing aids for different products of Wert Philippines as a freelance graphic designer.

name: Rezyd

description: Provided a box and bottle label design as a freelance graphic designer for REZYD Throat Spray, a product of Wert Philippines.
